title: Ticket #1660: lib_unit_tests.run reports erroneous success
description:
lib_unit_tests.run does something very stupid. If condor_unit_tests segfaulted or something, and didn't produce the summary, then the script would compare "total == passed" tests where both were initialized to zero. This resulted in the test passing green when it shouldn't have.

I fixed it and clarified the output a little bit. That script could use a bit more love... but at least it should more correctly understand when the condor_unit_tests actually produced a failure.
remarks:
2010-Sep-16 11:23:06 by psilord:
fixed on V7_4-branch, merged into master.
check_ins: 2010-Sep-16 11:14   Check-in [18992]: Fixed a stupid bug where if the condor_unit_tests program didn't produce the SUMMARY (suppose due to segfault), this script would compare $total == $passed, where both had been initialized to zero (and never filled in because the summary wasn't available). This would result in the test passing green [...] (By Peter Keller )
creator: psilord
